tooltip.scroll_namedblade_1.name: Records of household Named。
tooltip.scroll_namedblade_2.name: Records of some unknown blades。
tooltip.scroll_namedblade_3.name: Records of some Named that few people know。
tooltip.scroll_bamboo_1.name:
Record of a Tomihara bamboo blade...
§8§l§oReclusive Ronin, with the undecorated bamboo blade.
§8§l§oRepeled those who intruded on his peace of mind.
tooltip.scroll_bamboo_2.name:
Record of a bloody bamboo blade...
§8§l§oWhen the warrior dies, his blood is spilled on the bamboo blade.
§8§l§oSpirit slashed enemy's rampage.
tooltip.scroll_sakura.name:
Record of the legend of the devil war.
§8§l§o-Sakura-——Secret sword to purge all evil.
§8§l§oYet it is not known whence the evil one was born.
tooltip.scroll_bewitched.name:
Records of Bewitched Blade Legend
§8§l§oBewitched Blade, which was infused with Devil's power
§8§l§oIf used properly, you can drive Devils' power.
tooltip.scroll_requiem.name:
Record of an unspoken Requiem.
§8§l§o"The Ghost haunting in the Tower"
§8§l§o"Unwilling to leave his Blade..."
tooltip.scroll_aoi.name:
Records of another Yamazakura
§8§l§oThe Warrior with Yamazakura in hand...
§8§l§oThe moment the Heavy Rain fell, the space was cut open...
tooltip.scroll_tuki.name:
Records of Yamazakura
§8§l§oThe Warrior with Yamazakura in hand...
§8§l§oThe moment the Heavy Rain fell, the space was cut open...
tooltip.scroll_ghost.name:
Records of blades of Konpaku
The Tachi of Spirit Sakura...
tooltip.scroll_blood.name:
Records of the Immortal blade
§8§l§oThere had been two Immortal blades...
tooltip.scroll_shapeness.name:
Records of Extremely sharpness blades
§8§l§oExtremely epic blades. Some are hidden, some are abandoned...
tooltip.scroll_nether.name:
Record of Gokukaiken
§8§l§oSwordman in black, holding two crimson Blades.
§8§l§oNo one survived under her Blade; only rusty blood stains were left.
tooltip.scroll_nihil.name:
Record of -Nihil-
§8§l§oDesire to die for blood.
§8§l§oSo called Nihil.
tooltip.scroll_thaumium.name:
Research manuscript of Thaumaturge swordman.
§8§l§oThe intersection of the Thaumaturgy and the Japanese sword, when the blade of the Spirit comes out...
tooltip.scroll_crimson.name:
Research manuscript of Eldritch swordman.
§8§l§oThe Blade looking for blood, has the power to defile lives.
tooltip.scroll_creait.name:
Members List of -Mysterious Mountain Forging-Shop-
§8§l§oGroup Leader: §6R_Liu§r
§8§l§oDev: §6Syameimaru Zheng§r
§8§l§oArtists: §6R_Liu§r, §6Syameimaru Zheng§r, §6GodFox§r
§8§l§oSpecial thanks: §6Tartaric_Acid(First promotion video making)§r, §6limuness(Group members)§r, §6Nethop(Group members)§r, §6LT_lrsoft(Group members)
§e§lThanks for your playing, the main story is end.
tooltip.scroll_tech.name:
New High-tech Blade's Blueprint。
§8§l§oCombined with the edgy nanotechnology.
§8§l§oIt does its best when fully charged.
tooltip.scroll_highpowered.name:
-TLS- Model Blueprint。
§8§l§oLaser technology replaces a solid blade.
§8§l§oYou need to keep an eye on the remaining power and should not be used by those who are not good with blades.
achievement.lastsmith.first.title: -Wood-
achievement.lastsmith.first.desc: Make your own wooden blade by yourself.§8§l§oStudy the structure of blade, laying the groundwork for forging。
achievement.lastsmith.bamboolight.title: -Bamboo Light-
Make a Silver Bamboo Light.§8§l§oOriginal form of changeable Sheath.
achievement.lastsmith.white.title: -White-
achievement.lastsmith.white.desc: Forge a white sheath.§8§l§oBasic of Forging, Basic of Slash...
achievement.lastsmith.namedblade_1.title: Named Scroll-Volume I-
achievement.lastsmith.namedblade_1.desc: Got Named Blade§8§l§oRuby, Haze & Weiss Fox, Muramasa, Doutanuki, Tukumo...
achievement.lastsmith.namedblade_2.title: Named Scroll-Volume II-
achievement.lastsmith.namedblade_2.desc: Got unknown Named Blade and smithed a Nagasada, §8§l§oLonely warrior's SlashEdge, Prayer's Kusabimaru, and repilicas of Yamazakura scattered arround...
achievement.lastsmith.namedblade_3.title: Named Scroll-Complementary Volume-
achievement.lastsmith.namedblade_3.desc: Got famous Named Blade, §8§l§oBlue Plum, Two Blades in Plum Set, Blade with Gust, Fluorescent Bar, Blades of Frost Wolf, Yukari, Knife of BE...
achievement.lastsmith.bewitched.title: -Bewitched Blade-
achievement.lastsmith.bewitched.desc: Read the legends of Bewitched Blade. §8§l§oThe Blades infused with Devil power, are what we called "Bewitched Blades".
achievement.lastsmith.sakura_blade.title: Exorcism Blades
achievement.lastsmith.sakura_blade.desc: Got 4 Exorcism Blades, §8§l§oSakura, Ginkgo, Yukikage, Kataware...
achievement.lastsmith.scorn.title: -Requiem-
achievement.lastsmith.scorn.desc: Got Left blade of Lich...§8§l§oThe Undead has gone, but his Blade was left.
achievement.lastsmith.roukan_hakurou.des: Got-Roukanken-, -Hakurouken-§8§l§o The Tachi of Spirit Sakura...
achievement.lastsmith.bamboolight_reclus: Got Bamboo Blade of the Hermit. §8§l§oThe hermit Ronin, protected his peaceful life from his foes with a plain bamboo Blade.
achievement.lastsmith.silverbamboolight_: Got Bamboo Blade with Blood. §8§l§oThe dead swordman, spread his blood on his bamboo Blade. His spirit slayed all the enemies.
achievement.lastsmith.sagequoia.title: -Sagequoia-
achievement.lastsmith.amagumo.title: -Amagumo-
achievement.lastsmith.smith.final.title: Another -Amagumo-
achievement.lastsmith.smith.final.desc: Got Amagumo-Munin-§8§l§oThe buried third Amagumo...§4§l§oZheng's-Munin-, Was-Kanchi-
achievement.lastsmith.sharpness.title: -Extremely sharpness blades-
achievement.lastsmith.sharpness.desc: Witness Extremely sharpness blades histories...§4§l§oExtremely epic blades. Some are hidden, some are abandoned...
achievement.lastsmith.nihil.title: -Nihil-
achievement.lastsmith.nihil.desc: Witness -Nihil-...§4§l§oThe desire to die for blood
achievement.lastsmith.fushikiri.title: Fushikiri
achievement.lastsmith.fushikiri.desc: Got -Fushigiri-§8§l§oThe Blade of Killing the Immortal
achievement.lastsmith.roukan_hakurou_net: Got-Gokukaiken-§8§l§oThe Black swordman with two crimson blades...§4§l§oNo one survived from its blade, leaving only a trace of rust.
achievement.lastsmith.yamazakura.aoi.des: GotYamazakura-Aoi-§8§l§oAnother Yamazakura...The moment the Heavy Rain fell, the space was cut open...
achievement.lastsmith.yamazakura.kamuy.d: GotYamazakura-Tuki-§8§l§oTrue Yamazakura...The moment the Heavy Rain fell, the space was cut open...
achievement.lastsmith.bunshi.title: Technical testing
achievement.lastsmith.bunshi.desc: Got -Bunshi-§8§l§oThe Beginning of the Age of Civilization
achievement.lastsmith.thousand.title: Thousand Destruction
achievement.lastsmith.thaumic_katana.des: Got Thaumic Katana.§8§l§oThe intersection of the Thaumaturgy and the Japanese sword, when the blade of the Spirit comes out...
achievement.lastsmith.crimson_katana.des: Got Crimson Katana§8§l§oThe Blade looking for blood, has the power to defile lives.

guide.smith_guide.title: §oThe Bewitched Blade Forging
guide.smith_guide.landing_text: A tattered book written by a Youkai.
guide.smith_guide.subtitle: Unable to recognize the author's name
research.roukan_xf.title: Blade with Spirit Sakura and Cyclone
research.fortress_blade.title: Thaumic Katana
research.roukan_xf.text.stage.1:
While researching the elemental tools, you came up with some strange ideas.
What would it be like if a blade was given the power of the elemental sword?
research.roukan_xf.text.stage.2:
These two blades is an elemental item based on the Hakugyokurou gardener's blades.
Obviously, these blades has the same ability as the Sword of the Zephyr, but is much more powerful than that one.
Oh, some of the original blade's characteristics were missing...
research.fortess_blade.text.stage.1:
While researching elemental tools, you came up with some strange ideas.
Can a mysterious messenger create his own sharp blade? Perhaps a Japanese sword would be more appropriate than an unwieldy longsword...
You quickly wrote down the basic recipe, and further steps are...
research.fortess_blade.text.stage.2:
The practice of forcibly infusing spiritual energy with Infusion and the Spirit Sakura seems to work...
The intersection of the Thaumaturgy and the Japanese sword, when the blade of the Spirit comes out... ...
And the blade that thirsts for blood has the power to defile the living...
